holidays.title: National Arbor Day
holidays.description: Broadleaf. Evergreen. Conifer. How well do you really know your trees?

holidays.title: National Superhero Day
holidays.description: Get out your cape and celebrate National Superhero Day. Who makes the best superhero?

holidays.title: Biological Clock Day
holidays.description: Let’s appreciate the wonders of the circadian rhythms this Biological Clock Day.

holidays.title: Clean Comedy Day
holidays.description: Let's have some good, clean fun that everyone can join in on!

holidays.title: Donate Life Blue and Green Day
holidays.description: Let’s get our Blue and Green on as we help donate to life this holiday.

holidays.title: Global Pay It Forward Day
holidays.description: Don’t pay kindness back, pay it forward and continue a selfless chain reaction.

holidays.title: Great Poetry Reading Day
holidays.description: Poetry — a medium to convey thoughts and feelings by weaving words into simplistic or intricate designs.

holidays.title: Hung Kings Festival
holidays.description: Did you know the festival’s official name is Death Anniversary of the Hung Kings?

holidays.title: Kiss Your Mate Day
holidays.description: Tilt your head sideways, close those eyes, pucker the lips, and relish that passionate kiss!

holidays.title: National Blueberry Pie Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the wonder of nature’s only true blue fruit baked into a doughy, buttery pastry.

holidays.title: National BraveHearts Day
holidays.description: Today we honor the strength and bravery of people affected by pediatric cancer.

holidays.title: National Cubicle Day
holidays.description: March into your workplaces, recline those chairs, and unwind in that wonderful cubicle!

holidays.title: National Franklin Day
holidays.description: There are many popular Franklins in history. This is the day to honor your favorite!

holidays.title: National Hairball Awareness Day
holidays.description: Hairballs are a healthy part of animals’ routines, but can potentially be an underlying health issue.

holidays.title: Occupational Safety & Health Day
holidays.description: Let’s work together to raise awareness about the importance of occupational safety and health.

holidays.title: Save the Frogs Day
holidays.description: Today is dedicated to our hoppy, jumpy friends who are an important part of our environment.

holidays.title: Undiagnosed Children's Awareness Day
holidays.description: Children who are affected by Syndromes Without a Name and their families need our support.

holidays.title: Workers Memorial Day
holidays.description: Relive the struggles and sacrifices of workers' unions around the world and what they strived for.

holidays.title: Workers’ Memorial Day
holidays.description: All over the world, workers have contributed towards building a society that’s liveable and comfortable.

holidays.title: World Day for Safety and Health at Work
holidays.description: Safety and health at work are the names of the game on this day.

holidays.title: World Women’s Wellness Day
holidays.description: Join us, and let’s support women’s health across the world this World Women’s Wellness Day!

holidays.title: Big Ed’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's plunge into some intriguing insights into Big Ed's life throughout his reality stardom.

holidays.title: Melanie Martinez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ever wondered what this budding artist did after “The Voice?” We have the answers.
